data.architecture:
## Flutter Foundation Architecture

### Pattern: Clean Architecture with Feature-Based Modules

**Core Structure:**
```
lib/
â”œâ”€â”€ main.dart                    # Entry point with ProviderScope
â”œâ”€â”€ core/
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ config/
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ app_config.dart      # Environment-based configuration
â”‚   â”‚   â””â”€â”€ environment.dart     # Environment enum and helpers
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ di/
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ injection_container.dart  # get_it setup
â”‚   â”‚   â””â”€â”€ register_module.dart      # Manual registrations
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ errors/
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ exceptions.dart      # ServerException, CacheException
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ failures.dart        # Failure classes with Equatable
â”‚   â”‚   â””â”€â”€ error_handler.dart   # Centralized error handling
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ network/
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ dio_client.dart      # Singleton HTTP client
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ api_endpoints.dart   # API route constants
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ api_response.dart    # Generic response wrapper
â”‚   â”‚   â””â”€â”€ interceptors/
â”‚   â”‚       â”œâ”€â”€ auth_interceptor.dart    # Bearer token injection
â”‚   â”‚       â”œâ”€â”€ error_interceptor.dart   # DioException â†’ ServerException
â”‚   â”‚       â””â”€â”€ logging_interceptor.dart # Debug logging
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ usecases/
â”‚   â”‚   â””â”€â”€ usecase.dart         # Abstract UseCase<T, Params>
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ utils/
â”‚       â”œâ”€â”€ constants.dart       # App-wide constants
â”‚       â”œâ”€â”€ date_utils.dart      # Date formatting (ISO8601)
â”‚       â”œâ”€â”€ extensions.dart      # String, BuildContext extensions
â”‚       â””â”€â”€ validators.dart      # Email, password, username validation
```

### SOLID Principles Compliance:

1. **SRP**: Each class has single responsibility (DioClient for HTTP, Validators for validation)
2. **OCP**: UseCase abstract class allows extension without modification
3. **LSP**: All Failures extend base Failure class correctly
4. **ISP**: Small, focused interfaces (Interceptor methods)
5. **DIP**: DioClient depends on AppConfig abstraction, not hardcoded values

### Key Dependencies:
- **DI**: get_it + injectable (code generation)
- **HTTP**: Dio with interceptors
- **State**: flutter_riverpod
- **Routing**: go_router
- **Storage**: flutter_secure_storage
- **Functional**: dartz (Either<Failure, T>)

### API Contract (Backend Integration):
- Base URL: `http://localhost:3001/api`
- WebSocket: `ws://localhost:3001`
- Endpoints match backend routes: /auth/*, /steps/*, /sharing/*, /goals/*, /users/*

### Environment Configuration:
- Load .env with flutter_dotenv
- AppConfig singleton provides typed access
- Supports development, staging, production environments

stories.title: Configure pubspec.yaml with all required dependencies
stories.description:
Update pubspec.yaml to add all required dependencies for Clean Architecture Flutter app.

ğŸ”§ **PATTERNS TO USE:**
- Keep existing flutter SDK and cupertino_icons dependencies
- Add dependencies in alphabetical order within each section
- Use exact versions from epic spec (dio ^5.4.0, etc.)

ğŸ“¦ **REQUIRED DEPENDENCIES:**
```yaml
dependencies:
  dio: ^5.4.0
  flutter_riverpod: ^2.4.9
  go_router: ^13.0.0
  flutter_secure_storage: ^9.0.0
  health: ^10.0.0
  socket_io_client: ^2.0.3
  fl_chart: ^0.66.0
  workmanager: ^0.5.2
  get_it: ^7.6.4
  injectable: ^2.3.2
  equatable: ^2.0.5
  dartz: ^0.10.1
  intl: ^0.18.1
  flutter_dotenv: ^5.1.0

dev_dependencies:
  injectable_generator: ^2.4.1
  build_runner: ^2.4.8
```

âš ï¸ **ANTI-PATTERNS TO AVOID:**
- DO NOT remove existing dependencies
- DO NOT use 'any' version constraints
- DO NOT forget flutter_dotenv for environment config

**VERIFICATION:**
```bash
flutter pub get
flutter analyze
```
acceptanceCriteria: Given pubspec.yaml exists, When dependencies are added, Then flutter pub get succeeds without errors
Given all dependencies are added, When flutter analyze runs, Then no dependency resolution errors occur
Given flutter_dotenv is added, When checking pubspec.yaml, Then assets section includes .env file

stories.title: Create core folder structure with error classes and base UseCase
acceptanceCriteria: Given core/errors/ directory is created, When importing failures.dart, Then ServerFailure, CacheFailure, NetworkFailure classes are available
Given UseCase abstract class exists, When extending it, Then call() method signature uses Either<Failure, T>
Given injection_container.dart exists, When importing it, Then configureDependencies() function is available

stories.title: Configure Dio HTTP client with interceptors in lib/core/network/
acceptanceCriteria: Given DioClient is created, When injected via get_it, Then it uses base URL from AppConfig
Given AuthInterceptor is active, When token exists in secure storage, Then requests include Bearer token header
Given ErrorInterceptor catches DioException, When error occurs, Then ServerException is thrown with status code
Given ApiEndpoints class exists, When accessing endpoints, Then all paths match backend API routes

stories.title: Create utility classes and extensions in lib/core/utils/
acceptanceCriteria: Given Validators class exists, When validating email 'test@example.com', Then isValidEmail returns true
Given Validators class exists, When validating password 'weak', Then validatePassword returns error message
Given AppDateUtils exists, When formatting DateTime, Then output matches 'yyyy-MM-dd' format
Given StringExtension exists, When calling 'hello'.capitalized, Then returns 'Hello'

stories.title: Create main.dart with ProviderScope and DI initialization
acceptanceCriteria: Given main.dart is updated, When app starts, Then WidgetsFlutterBinding.ensureInitialized() is called first
Given .env file exists, When app loads, Then dotenv.env contains API_BASE_URL
Given configureDependencies() is called, When accessing getIt, Then DioClient can be resolved
Given App widget exists, When building, Then it is wrapped with ProviderScope
